Message: dev_rfc.trc files which contain only messages about changing the global trace directory are not generated any more (NW RFC)
Added CommitWork and RollbackWork methods to ERPDataContext for LINQtoERP.
Added LINQtoERP support to Visual Studio 2015.
Updated support client to 10.0.43879.0 and added shortcut
Fix for sending integers & floats to big endian systems
Added logic to scroll last added output field into view once it got added.
Updated logic to highlight output field during moving actions (move up/down).
Added logic to add and delete all table fields from the output field selection list.
Updated validation logic to check table references in criteria clauses once a table will be deleted.
